long_description: The Harmony Royalex Skid Plate kit adds impact and abrasion resistance to the wear-prone areas of a Royalex canoe. Perfect for repair or enhancement, the Skid Plate kit can be placed under the hull on either side of the keel line. Pre-cut Kevlar(R) felts are thick and long to provide excellent protection. Proprietary resin system creates a very secure bond to the vinyl skin of Royalex. Harmony Royalex Skid Plate kit includes felts, resin A, resin B, sandpaper, sanding box, gloves and instructions.
short_description: The Harmony Royalex Skid Plate kit adds impact and abrasion resistance to the wear-prone areas of a Royalex canoe.
